c3py.ticks¶

class c3py.ticks.XTicks(axis)¶

Bases: c3py.ticks.Ticks

cull(max_ticks)¶

Limit the number of x tick labels displayed.

Parameters:max_ticks (int) – The maximum number of x tick labels to be displayed.
Returns:None
rotate(degrees)¶

Rotate the x tick labels.

Parameters:degrees (int; between 0 and 360) – The number of degrees by which to rotate the x tick labels.
Returns:None
set_fit(fit)¶

Fit x axis ticks. If true set, the ticks will be positioned nicely. If false set, the ticks will be positioned according to x value of the data points.

Parameters:fit (bool) – Whether or not to fit x axis ticks.
Returns:None
set_multiline(multiline)¶

Control whether or not the x tick labels should occupy multiple lines.

Parameters:multiline (bool) – Whether or not the x tick labels should occupy multiple lines
Returns:None
class c3py.ticks.YTicks(axis)¶

Bases: c3py.ticks.Ticks

class c3py.ticks.Ticks(axis)¶

Manipulate the axis ticks.

Parameters:axis (c3py.axes.Axis) – The axis object to which the ticks belong.
set_count(tick_count)¶

Set the number of ticks on the axis.

Parameters:tick_count (int) – The desired number of ticks.
Returns:None
set_format(tick_format)¶

Set the formatting of the tick labels. See https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Formatting for formatting numbers, and https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Formatting for formatting dates / times.

Parameters:tick_format (str) – The formatting of the tick labels.
Returns:None
set_values(tick_values)¶

Set the values of the ticks.

Parameters:tick_values (list) – A list of tick values.
Returns:None
